channel.title: Land of Magic [IDEA ONLY AT THE MOMENT]
channel.description:
So before I make a development on a small project I have been working on I wanted to get some feedback.
The main idea of Land of Magic is a server that does not use melee/range/other forms of combat. Just magic. Magic, in itself controls everything. If you wish to cook some fish you have to use a "cooking spell" to start a fire, then to cook the fish on the fire.
Not all the details are made yet. I would love to get some feedback on how this could all be improved and for every skill.
The only major way to train the magic level is by doing skills via the magic.
You know how on runescape there is the enchanting interface? Well that was the main motivation for the idea.
I would love some feedback

@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:32, topic:440041”]I think it’s a good idea, but you’re going to run out of gfx and anims to use for spells, lol.[/quote]I’ll probably delete lunar and use some of those gfx/anims to be honest

or…

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:33, topic:440041”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=542723.msg3978950#msg3978950 date=1335014921]
I think it’s a good idea, but you’re going to run out of gfx and anims to use for spells, lol.
[/quote]
I think that might be where I come in. :p[/quote]

item.title: Land of Magic [IDEA ONLY AT THE MOMENT]
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:26, topic:440041”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=542723.msg3978768#msg3978768 date=1334982384]

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=542723.msg3978317#msg3978317 date=1334938908]

The client is jagex’s property, the source is 100% yours.
[/quote]No… the cache is partly their property. Client is not theirs at all.
[/quote]You, sir, are an idiot. The ENTIRE CLIENT is Jagex’s property, including the cache. How in the hell would the cache be “partly their property”?

??? In no way is the client their property. It is no way like theirs and was custom coded just like a server. The cache is partly theirs because they don’t own everything in it.[/quote]
What the hell are you talking about? The client and cache are both property of Jagex.

Read full topic
